data.text:
Bruce Allen Davison is an actor who appeared in several western series.

Series[]

1923 (3 episodes)[]

In this TV series Bruce Davison plays Arthur. Check out the list(s) and/or table(s) below to find out in which episode(s) he made an appearance.

Season 1 (3 episodes)[]

Nature's Empty Throne (episode 2)

The Rule of Five Hundred (episode 7)

Nothing Left to Lose (episode 8)

Dead Man's Gun (1 episode)[]

Ties That Bind (season 2, episode 2)

Hec Ramsey (1 episode)[]

The Mystery of Chalk Hill (season 1, episode 5)

The Son (1 episode)[]

Legend (season 2, episode 10)

[]
